existing_features.title: In the milk collection form, pressing Enter in the farmer ID field should move focus to the quantity field
In the milk collection form, pressing Enter in the quantity field should move focus to the fat field
In the milk collection form, pressing Enter in the fat field should trigger the save action

new_feature_requests.summary: Use Enter key to move between form fields (farmer id → quantity → fat → save)

projectName: Add Enter key navigation between form fields
